page.title: 07SCOTTISH SCHOOL OF FORESTRY
page.content: The School is a part of Inverness Technical College.It offers a wide range of courses.It was opened in the early 70s named the Forest Indusry Centre and then in 1980 approximately it was re-opened and named the Scottish School of Forestry.Students wear special clothing when using forestry machinery.They wear steel cap boots,protective trousers with padding,a helmet and a protective jacket.When they are using a chainsaw they wear protective gloves.A course lasts for up to 2 years and then they become Forest Managers.There are only two schools in Britain offering such a wide range ,the other being the Cumbria College of Agriculture and Forestry in North West England.They also teach girls.
